articles.author: Savanna Young
articles.title: Chris Hemsworth 'taking on fewer acting roles' after discovering he is predisposed to Alzheimer's - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chris Hemsworth is said to be taking a huge step back from Hollywood film roles after discovering he is genetically predisposed to Alzheimer's disease.
articles.content:
Chris Hemsworth is said to be taking a huge step back from Hollywood film roles after discovering he is genetically predisposed to Alzheimer's disease.
The Australian actor, 39, isn't planning on re… [+3614 chars]
